message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's a fair offer to start.
Let's try a bit more in my favor!
Okay, Bob, let's meet in the middle. I'll take $55, you take $45. We should settle this before inflation eats away at the value!
Getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Inflation is biting!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Inflation is hurting us both. I'm dropping my share to $52, you get $48. Take it or leave it - we need to settle this now!
